long_description: The REI Quarter Dome 2 Footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear. Footprint is sized a bit smaller than the tent floor to prevent water from pooling underneath the tent during rainy weather. Color-coding on the webbing stake-outs at the corners allows easy attachment. For a minimalist pitch option, leave your tent body at home and set up its rainfly, poles and this footprint as an ultralight shelter. The REI Quarter Dome 2 Footprint fits only the 2014 REI Quarter Dome 2 Tent (sold separately).
short_description: The REI Quarter Dome 2 Footprint extends the life of your tent by protecting the floor from abrasion and excess wear and tear.
